blocks.name: cbcc
blocks.content: Extend class notation to include the generalized binomial coefficient operation.

blocks.name: df-bcc
blocks.content: Define a generalized binomial coefficient operation, which unlike ~ df-bc allows complex numbers for the first argument. (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 22-Apr-2020.)

blocks.name: bccval
blocks.content: Value of the generalized binomial coefficient, ` C ` choose ` K ` . (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 22-Apr-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm bccval(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cbcc, c1), co(co(c0, cfallfac, c1), cdiv, cfv(cfa, c1))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cn0))
} = {
  ovmpt2d(hs0, hs1, c0, cbcc, c1, co(co(c0, cfallfac, c1), cdiv, cfv(cfa, c1)), cc, cn0, co(co(cv(hs0), cfallfac, cv(hs1)), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(hs1))), universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(cbcc, cmpo(hs0, hs1, cc, cn0, co(co(cv(hs0), cfallfac, cv(hs1)), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(hs1))))))
  df-bcc(hs0, hs1)
  oveq12d(co(cv(hs0), cfallfac, cv(hs1)), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(hs1)), co(c0, cfallfac, c1), cfv(cfa, c1), wa(w0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))))
  oveq12d(cv(hs0), cfallfac, cv(hs1), c0, c1, wa(w0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))))
  simprl(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  fveq2d(cfa, cv(hs1), c1, wa(w0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))))
  simprr(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  ovexd(co(c0, cfallfac, c1), cdiv, cfv(cfa, c1), w0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(co(co(c0, cfallfac, c1), cdiv, cfv(cfa, c1)))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(co(co(c0, cfallfac, c1), cdiv, cfv(cfa, c1)))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm bccval(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[_Cc]c1)=((c0[FallFac]c1)[÷](! ` c1)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ ℕ0)
} = {
  ovmpt2d(hs0, hs1, c0, cbcc, c1, ((c0[FallFac]c1)[÷](! ` c1)), cc, cn0, ((hs0[FallFac]hs1)[÷](! ` hs1)), universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, _Cc =(hs0 ∈ ℂ, hs1 ∈ ℕ0 ↦((hs0[FallFac]hs1)[÷](! ` hs1))))
  df-bcc(hs0, hs1)
  oveq12d((hs0[FallFac]hs1), cdiv, (! ` hs1), (c0[FallFac]c1), (! ` c1), (w0 ∧(hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c1)))
  oveq12d(hs0, cfallfac, hs1, c0, c1, (w0 ∧(hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c1)))
  simprl(w0, hs0 = c0, hs1 = c1)
  fveq2d(cfa, hs1, c1, (w0 ∧(hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c1)))
  simprr(w0, hs0 = c0, hs1 = c1)
  ovexd((c0[FallFac]c1), cdiv, (! ` c1), w0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(((c0[FallFac]c1)[÷](! ` c1)))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(((c0[FallFac]c1)[÷](! ` c1)))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
}

blocks.name: bcccl
blocks.content: Closure of the generalized binomial coefficient. (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 22-Apr-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm bcccl(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cbcc, c1), cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cn0))
} = {
  eqeltrd(co(c0, cbcc, c1), cc, co(co(c0, cfallfac, c1), cdiv, cfv(cfa, c1)), w0)
  bccval(c0, c1, w0)
  divcld(co(c0, cfallfac, c1), cfv(cfa, c1), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(co(c0, cfallfac, c1), cc), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn0))
  fallfaccl(c0, c1)
  nncnd(cfv(cfa, c1), w0)
  nnne0d(cfv(cfa, c1), w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(cfv(cfa, c1), cn), wcel(c1, cn0))
  faccl(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm bcccl(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[_Cc]c1)∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ ℕ0)
} = {
  eqeltrd((c0[_Cc]c1), cc, ((c0[FallFac]c1)[÷](! ` c1)), w0)
  bccval(c0, c1, w0)
  divcld((c0[FallFac]c1), (! ` c1), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, (c0[FallFac]c1)∈ ℂ, c0 ∈ ℂ, c1 ∈ ℕ0)
  fallfaccl(c0, c1)
  nncnd((! ` c1), w0)
  nnne0d((! ` c1), w0)
  syl(w0, (! ` c1)∈ ℕ, c1 ∈ ℕ0)
  faccl(c1)
}

blocks.name: bcc0
blocks.content: The generalized binomial coefficient ` C ` choose ` K ` is zero iff ` C ` is an integer between zero and ` ( K - 1 ) ` inclusive. (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 22-Apr-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm bcc0(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wceq(co(c0, cbcc, c1), nat0), wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c1, cmin, nat1)))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cn0))
} = {
  3bitrd(w0, wceq(co(c0, cbcc, c1), nat0), wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c1, cmin, nat1))), wceq(co(co(c0, cfallfac, c1), cdiv, cfv(cfa, c1)), nat0), wceq(co(c0, cfallfac, c1), nat0))
  eqeq1d(co(c0, cbcc, c1), nat0, co(co(c0, cfallfac, c1), cdiv, cfv(cfa, c1)), w0)
  bccval(c0, c1, w0)
  diveq0ad(co(c0, cfallfac, c1), cfv(cfa, c1), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(co(c0, cfallfac, c1), cc), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn0))
  fallfaccl(c0, c1)
  nncnd(cfv(cfa, c1), w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(cfv(cfa, c1), cn), wcel(c1, cn0))
  faccl(c1)
  syl(w0, wne(cfv(cfa, c1), nat0), wcel(c1, cn0))
  facne0(c1)
  bitr4d(w0, wceq(co(c0, cfallfac, c1), nat0), wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c1, cmin, nat1))), wceq(cprod(hs0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c1, cmin, nat1)), co(c0, cmin, cv(hs0))), nat0))
  eqeq1d(co(c0, cfallfac, c1), nat0, cprod(hs0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c1, cmin, nat1)), co(c0, cmin, cv(hs0))), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(co(c0, cfallfac, c1), cprod(hs0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c1, cmin, nat1)), co(c0, cmin, cv(hs0)))), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn0))
  fallfacval(hs0, c0, c1)
  impbid(w0, wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c1, cmin, nat1))), wceq(cprod(hs0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c1, cmin, nat1)), co(c0, cmin, cv(hs0))), nat0))
  ex(w0, wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c1, cmin, nat1))), wceq(cprod(hs0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c1, cmin, nat1)), co(c0, cmin, cv(hs0))), nat0))
  mpdan(wa(w0, wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c1, cmin, nat1)))), wceq(cprod(hs0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c1, cmin, nat1)), co(c0, cmin, cv(hs0))), nat0), wcel(co(c1, cmin, nat1), cfv(cuz, c0)))
  adantl(w0, wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c1, cmin, nat1))), wcel(co(c1, cmin, nat1), cfv(cuz, c0)))
  elfzuz3(c0, nat0, co(c1, cmin, nat1))
  fprodeq0(hs0, co(c1, cmin, nat1), c0, nat0, co(c0, cmin, cv(hs0)), cn0, wa(w0, wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c1, cmin, nat1)))))
  nn0uz()
  adantl(w0, wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c1, cmin, nat1))), wcel(c0, cn0))
  elfznn0(c0, co(c1, cmin, nat1))
  subcld(c0, cv(hs0), wa(wa(w0, wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c1, cmin, nat1)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cn0)))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c1, cmin, nat1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cn0), wcel(c0, cc))
  adantl(wa(w0, wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c1, cmin, nat1)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cn0), wcel(cv(hs0), cc))
  nn0cn(cv(hs0))
  subeq0bd(c0, cv(hs0), wa(wa(w0, wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c1, cmin, nat1)))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c1, cmin, nat1))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(c0, cc))
  adantl(wa(w0, wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c1, cmin, nat1)))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(c0, cv(hs0)))
  biimpi(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(c0, cv(hs0)))
  eqcom(cv(hs0), c0)
  necon4bd(cprod(hs0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c1, cmin, nat1)), co(c0, cmin, cv(hs0))), nat0, w0, wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c1, cmin, nat1))))
  ex(w0, wn(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c1, cmin, nat1)))), wne(cprod(hs0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c1, cmin, nat1)), co(c0, cmin, cv(hs0))), nat0))
  fprodn0(hs0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c1, cmin, nat1)), co(c0, cmin, cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wn(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c1, cmin, nat1))))))
  fzfid(nat0, co(c1, cmin, nat1), wa(w0, wn(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c1, cmin, nat1))))))
  subcld(c0, cv(hs0), wa(wa(w0, wn(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c1, cmin, nat1))))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfz, co(c1, cmin, nat1)))))
  subne0d(c0, cv(hs0), wa(wa(w0, wn(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c1, cmin, nat1))))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfz, co(c1, cmin, nat1)))))
  ad2antrr(w0, wn(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c1, cmin, nat1)))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfz, co(c1, cmin, nat1))), wcel(c0, cc))
  adantl(wa(w0, wn(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c1, cmin, nat1))))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfz, co(c1, cmin, nat1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cc))
  nn0cnd(cv(hs0), wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfz, co(c1, cmin, nat1))))
  elfznn0(cv(hs0), co(c1, cmin, nat1))
  adantll(w0, wn(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c1, cmin, nat1)))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfz, co(c1, cmin, nat1))), wne(c0, cv(hs0)))
  ancoms(wn(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c1, cmin, nat1)))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfz, co(c1, cmin, nat1))), wne(c0, cv(hs0)))
  necomd(c0, cv(hs0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfz, co(c1, cmin, nat1))), wn(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c1, cmin, nat1))))))
  nelne2(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfz, co(c1, cmin, nat1)), c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c1, cmin, nat1))
  diff.hs0.c(nat0)
  diff.hs0.c(cn0)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(w0, wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c1, cmin, nat1)))))
  diff.hs0.c(co(nat0, cfz, co(c1, cmin, nat1)))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(w0, wn(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c1, cmin, nat1))))))
}

blocks.name: bccp1k
blocks.content: Generalized binomial coefficient: ` C ` choose ` ( K + 1 ) ` . (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 22-Apr-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm bccp1k(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cbcc, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), co(co(c0, cbcc, c1), cmul, co(co(c0, cmin, c1), cdiv, co(c1, caddc, nat1)))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cn0))
} = {
  eqtr4d(co(c0, cbcc, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), co(co(c0, cbcc, c1), cmul, co(co(c0, cmin, c1), cdiv, co(c1, caddc, nat1))), co(co(co(c0, cfallfac, c1), cdiv, cfv(cfa, c1)), cmul, co(co(c0, cmin, c1), cdiv, co(c1, caddc, nat1))), w0)
  3eqtr4d(co(c0, cbcc, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), co(co(co(c0, cfallfac, c1), cdiv, cfv(cfa, c1)), cmul, co(co(c0, cmin, c1), cdiv, co(c1, caddc, nat1))), co(co(c0, cfallfac, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), cdiv, cfv(cfa, co(c1, caddc, nat1))), co(co(co(c0, cfallfac, c1), cmul, co(c0, cmin, c1)), cdiv, co(cfv(cfa, c1), cmul, co(c1, caddc, nat1))), w0)
  oveq12d(co(c0, cfallfac, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), cdiv, cfv(cfa, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), co(co(c0, cfallfac, c1), cmul, co(c0, cmin, c1)), co(cfv(cfa, c1), cmul, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(co(c0, cfallfac, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), co(co(c0, cfallfac, c1), cmul, co(c0, cmin, c1))), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn0))
  fallfacp1(c0, c1)
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(cfa, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), co(cfv(cfa, c1), cmul, co(c1, caddc, nat1))), wcel(c1, cn0))
  facp1(c1)
  bccval(c0, co(c1, caddc, nat1), w0)
  divmuldivd(co(c0, cfallfac, c1), cfv(cfa, c1), co(c0, cmin, c1), co(c1, caddc, nat1), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(co(c0, cfallfac, c1), cc), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn0))
  fallfaccl(c0, c1)
  nncnd(cfv(cfa, c1), w0)
  subcld(c0, c1, w0)
  nn0cnd(c1, w0)
  nn0cnd(co(c1, caddc, nat1), w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cn0), wcel(c1, cn0))
  peano2nn0(c1)
  nnne0d(cfv(cfa, c1), w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(cfv(cfa, c1), cn), wcel(c1, cn0))
  faccl(c1)
  nnne0d(co(c1, caddc, nat1), w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cn), wcel(c1, cn0))
  nn0p1nn(c1)
  oveq1d(co(c0, cbcc, c1), cmul, co(co(c0, cmin, c1), cdiv, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), co(co(c0, cfallfac, c1), cdiv, cfv(cfa, c1)), w0)
  bccval(c0, c1, w0)
}

blocks.name: bccm1k
blocks.content: Generalized binomial coefficient: ` C ` choose ` ( K - 1 ) ` , when ` C ` is not ` ( K - 1 ) ` . (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 22-Apr-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm bccm1k(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cbcc, co(c1, cmin, nat1)), co(co(c0, cbcc, c1), cdiv, co(co(c0, cmin, co(c1, cmin, nat1)), cdiv, c1))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cdif(cc, csn(co(c1, cmin, nat1)))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cn))
} = {
  mvllmuld(co(c0, cbcc, co(c1, cmin, nat1)), co(c0, cbcc, c1), co(co(c0, cmin, co(c1, cmin, nat1)), cdiv, c1), w0)
  divne0d(co(c0, cmin, co(c1, cmin, nat1)), c1, w0)
  subne0d(c0, co(c1, cmin, nat1), w0)
  syl(w0, wne(c0, co(c1, cmin, nat1)), wcel(c0, cdif(cc, csn(co(c1, cmin, nat1)))))
  eldifsni(c0, cc, co(c1, cmin, nat1))
  eqtr2d(co(co(co(c0, cmin, co(c1, cmin, nat1)), cdiv, c1), cmul, co(c0, cbcc, co(c1, cmin, nat1))), co(c0, cbcc, c1), co(co(c0, cbcc, co(c1, cmin, nat1)), cmul, co(co(c0, cmin, co(c1, cmin, nat1)), cdiv, c1)), w0)
  3eqtr3d(co(c0, cbcc, c1), co(co(c0, cbcc, co(c1, cmin, nat1)), cmul, co(co(c0, cmin, co(c1, cmin, nat1)), cdiv, c1)), co(c0, cbcc, co(co(c1, cmin, nat1), caddc, nat1)), co(co(c0, cbcc, co(c1, cmin, nat1)), cmul, co(co(c0, cmin, co(c1, cmin, nat1)), cdiv, co(co(c1, cmin, nat1), caddc, nat1))), w0)
  bccp1k(c0, co(c1, cmin, nat1), w0)
  oveq2d(c0, cbcc, co(co(c1, cmin, nat1), caddc, nat1), c1, w0)
  oveq2d(co(c0, cbcc, co(c1, cmin, nat1)), cmul, co(co(c0, cmin, co(c1, cmin, nat1)), cdiv, co(co(c1, cmin, nat1), caddc, nat1)), co(co(c0, cmin, co(c1, cmin, nat1)), cdiv, c1), w0)
  oveq2d(co(c0, cmin, co(c1, cmin, nat1)), cdiv, co(co(c1, cmin, nat1), caddc, nat1), c1, w0)
  npcand(c1, nat1, w0)
  mulcomd(co(c0, cbcc, co(c1, cmin, nat1)), co(co(c0, cmin, co(c1, cmin, nat1)), cdiv, c1), w0)
  bcccl(c0, co(c1, cmin, nat1), w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(co(c1, cmin, nat1), cn0), wcel(c1, cn))
  nnm1nn0(c1)
  divcld(co(c0, cmin, co(c1, cmin, nat1)), c1, w0)
  subcld(c0, co(c1, cmin, nat1), w0)
  eldifad(c0, cc, csn(co(c1, cmin, nat1)), w0)
  subcld(c1, nat1, w0)
  1cnd(w0)
  nncnd(c1, w0)
  nnne0d(c1, w0)
}

blocks.name: bccn0
blocks.content: Generalized binomial coefficient: ` C ` choose ` 0 ` . (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 22-Apr-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm bccn0(class c0, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cbcc, nat0), nat1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cc))
} = {
  eqtrd(co(c0, cbcc, nat0), nat1, co(co(c0, cfallfac, nat0), cdiv, cfv(cfa, nat0)), w0)
  bccval(c0, nat0, w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(nat0, cn0))
  0nn0()
  syl6eq(co(co(c0, cfallfac, nat0), cdiv, cfv(cfa, nat0)), nat1, co(nat1, cdiv, nat1), w0)
  oveq12d(co(c0, cfallfac, nat0), cdiv, cfv(cfa, nat0), nat1, nat1, w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(co(c0, cfallfac, nat0), nat1), wcel(c0, cc))
  fallfac0(c0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(cfv(cfa, nat0), nat1))
  fac0()
  1div1e1()
}
blocks.pretty:
thm bccn0(class c0, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[_Cc]0)= 1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ ℂ)
} = {
  eqtrd((c0[_Cc]0), nat1, ((c0[FallFac]0)[÷](! ` 0)), w0)
  bccval(c0, nat0, w0)
  a1i(w0, 0 ∈ ℕ0)
  0nn0()
  syl6eq(((c0[FallFac]0)[÷](! ` 0)), nat1, (1[÷]1), w0)
  oveq12d((c0[FallFac]0), cdiv, (! ` 0), nat1, nat1, w0)
  syl(w0, (c0[FallFac]0)= 1, c0 ∈ ℂ)
  fallfac0(c0)
  a1i(w0, (! ` 0)= 1)
  fac0()
  1div1e1()
}

blocks.name: bccn1
blocks.content: Generalized binomial coefficient: ` C ` choose ` 1 ` . (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 22-Apr-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm bccn1(class c0, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cbcc, nat1), c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cc))
} = {
  eqtrd(co(c0, cbcc, nat1), c0, co(nat1, cmul, c0), w0)
  3eqtr3d(co(c0, cbcc, nat1), co(nat1, cmul, c0), co(c0, cbcc, co(nat0, caddc, nat1)), co(co(c0, cbcc, nat0), cmul, co(co(c0, cmin, nat0), cdiv, co(nat0, caddc, nat1))), w0)
  bccp1k(c0, nat0, w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(nat0, cn0))
  0nn0()
  a1i(w0, wceq(co(c0, cbcc, co(nat0, caddc, nat1)), co(c0, cbcc, nat1)))
  oveq2i(c0, cbcc, co(nat0, caddc, nat1), nat1)
  oveq12d(co(c0, cbcc, nat0), cmul, co(co(c0, cmin, nat0), cdiv, co(nat0, caddc, nat1)), nat1, c0, w0)
  bccn0(c0, w0)
  eqtrd(co(co(c0, cmin, nat0), cdiv, co(nat0, caddc, nat1)), c0, co(c0, cdiv, nat1), w0)
  oveq12d(co(c0, cmin, nat0), cdiv, co(nat0, caddc, nat1), c0, nat1, w0)
  subid1d(c0, w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(co(nat0, caddc, nat1), nat1))
  0p1e1()
  div1d(c0, w0)
  mulid2d(c0, w0)
}

blocks.name: bccbc
blocks.content: The binomial coefficient and generalized binomial coefficient are equal when their arguments are nonnegative integers. (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 22-Apr-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm bccbc(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cbcc, c1), co(c0, cbc, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cn0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cn0))
} = {
  pm2.61dan(w0, wceq(co(c0, cbcc, c1), co(c0, cbc, c1)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c0)))
  eqtr4d(co(c0, cbcc, c1), co(c0, cbc, c1), co(co(c0, cfallfac, c1), cdiv, cfv(cfa, c1)), wa(w0, wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c0))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c0)), wceq(co(c0, cbcc, c1), co(co(c0, cfallfac, c1), cdiv, cfv(cfa, c1))))
  bccval(c0, c1, w0)
  adantl(w0, wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c0)), wceq(co(c0, cbc, c1), co(co(c0, cfallfac, c1), cdiv, cfv(cfa, c1))))
  bcfallfac(c1, c0)
  eqtr4d(co(c0, cbcc, c1), co(c0, cbc, c1), nat0, wa(w0, wn(wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c0)))))
  syldan(w0, wn(wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c0))), wceq(co(c0, cbcc, c1), nat0), wbr(c0, clt, c1))
  syldan(w0, wn(wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c0))), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wcel(c1, cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))))
  orcanai(w0, wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c0)), wcel(c1, cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))))
  sylib(w0, wo(wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c0)), wcel(c1, cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))), wcel(c1, cun(co(nat0, cfz, c0), cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))))
  eleqtrd(c1, cun(co(nat0, cfz, c0), cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), cn0, w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cn0, cun(co(nat0, cfz, c0), cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))), wcel(c0, cn0))
  nn0split(c0)
  elun(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c0), cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))
  mpbird(wa(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cle, c1))
  adantl(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wbr(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cle, c1))
  eluzle(c1, co(c0, caddc, nat1))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wb(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cle, c1)))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cle, c1)), wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz))
  zltp1le(c0, c1)
  anabss5(w0, wbr(c0, clt, c1), wceq(co(c0, cbcc, c1), nat0))
  sylanr1(w0, w0, wbr(c0, clt, c1), wceq(co(c0, cbcc, c1), nat0), wbr(nat0, cle, c0))
  nn0ge0d(c0, w0)
  syldan(w0, wa(wbr(nat0, cle, c0), wbr(c0, clt, c1)), wceq(co(c0, cbcc, c1), nat0), wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, c1)))
  biimpar(w0, wa(wbr(nat0, cle, c0), wbr(c0, clt, c1)), wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, c1)))
  syl3anc(w0, wb(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, c1)), wa(wbr(nat0, cle, c0), wbr(c0, clt, c1))), wcel(c0, cz), wcel(nat0, cz), wcel(c1, cz))
  nn0zd(c0, w0)
  0zd(w0)
  elfzo(c0, nat0, c1)
  syldan(w0, wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, c1)), wceq(co(c0, cbcc, c1), nat0), wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c1, cmin, nat1))))
  biimpa(w0, wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, c1)), wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c1, cmin, nat1))))
  eleq2d(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, c1), co(nat0, cfz, co(c1, cmin, nat1)), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(co(nat0, cfzo, c1), co(nat0, cfz, co(c1, cmin, nat1))), wcel(c1, cz))
  fzoval(c1, nat0)
  biimpar(w0, wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c1, cmin, nat1))), wceq(co(c0, cbcc, c1), nat0))
  bcc0(c0, c1, w0)
  nn0cnd(c0, w0)
  sylan(w0, wn(wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c0))), wceq(co(c0, cbc, c1), nat0), wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cz)))
  jca(w0, wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cz))
  nn0zd(c1, w0)
  3expa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cz), wn(wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c0))), wceq(co(c0, cbc, c1), nat0))
  bcval3(c0, c1)
}
